cards.name: Burn
text: At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

cards.name: Decay
text: At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

cards.name: Doubt
text: At the end of your turn, gain 1 <kw>Weak</kw>.

cards.name: Necronomicurse
text: There is no escape from this <kw>Curse</kw>.

cards.name: Normality
text: You cannot play more than 3 cards this turn.

cards.name: Pain
text: While in hand, lose 1 HP when other cards are played.

cards.name: Parasite
text: If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.

cards.name: Regret
text: At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Dark Shackles
text: Enemy loses 9 <kw>Strength</kw> for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Dark Shackles+
text: Enemy loses <u>15</u> <kw>Strength</kw> for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Deep Breath
text: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Deep Breath+
text: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Jack Of All Trades
text: Add a random colorless card to your hand.

cards.name: Jack Of All Trades+
text: Add <u>2</u> random colorless cards to your hand.

cards.name: Madness
text: A random card in your hand costs 0 for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Madness+
text: A random card in your hand costs 0 for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Mind Blast
text: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Mind Blast+
text: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Purity
text: Choose and <kw>Exhaust</kw> 3 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Purity+
text: Choose and <kw>Exhaust</kw> <u>5</u> cards in your hand.

cards.name: Apotheosis
text: <kw>Upgrade</kw> ALL of your cards for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Apotheosis+
text: <kw>Upgrade</kw> ALL of your cards for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Enlightenment
text: Reduce the cost of cards in your hand to 1 this turn.

cards.name: Enlightenment+
text: Reduce the cost of cards in your hand to 1 this <u>combat</u>.

cards.name: Panache
text: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Panache+
text: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, deal <u>14</u> damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Sadistic Nature
text: Whenever you apply a Debuff to an enemy, they take 3 damage.

cards.name: Sadistic Nature+
text: Whenever you apply a Debuff to an enemy, they take <u>4</u> damage.

cards.name: Secret Technique
text: Choose a Skill from your draw pile and place it into your hand.

cards.name: Secret Technique+
text: Choose a Skill from your draw pile and place it into your hand.

cards.name: Secret Weapon
text: Choose an Attack from your draw pile and place it into your hand.

cards.name: Secret Weapon+
text: Choose an Attack from your draw pile and place it into your hand.

cards.name: Thinking Ahead
text: Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Thinking Ahead+
text: Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Transmutation
text: Add X random colorless cards into your hand.

cards.name: Transmutation+
text: Add X random <u>upgraded</u> colorless cards into your hand.

cards.name: Anger
text: Place a copy of this card in your discard pile.

cards.name: Anger+
text: Place a copy of this card in your discard pile.

cards.name: Armaments
text: <kw>Upgrade</kw> a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Armaments+
text: <kw>Upgrade</kw> <u>ALL</u> cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Body Slam
text: Deal damage equal to your current <kw>Block</kw>.

cards.name: Body Slam+
text: Deal damage equal to your current <kw>Block</kw>.

cards.name: Clash
text: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack.

cards.name: Clash+
text: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack.

cards.name: Flex
text: At the end of your turn, lose 2 <kw>Strength</kw>.

cards.name: Flex+
text: At the end of your turn, lose <u>4</u> <kw>Strength</kw>.

cards.name: Havoc
text: Play the top card of your draw pile and <kw>Exhaust</kw> it.

cards.name: Havoc+
text: Play the top card of your draw pile and <kw>Exhaust</kw> it.

cards.name: Headbutt
text: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Headbutt+
text: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Perfected Strike
text: Deals an additional +2 damage for ALL of your cards containing "Strike".

cards.name: Perfected Strike+
text: Deals an additional +<u>3</u> damage for ALL of your cards containing "Strike".

cards.name: Sword Boomerang
text: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3 times.

cards.name: Sword Boomerang+
text: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy <u>4</u> times.

cards.name: Thunderclap

text: Deal <u>7</u> damage and apply 1 <kw>Vulnerable</kw> to ALL enemies.

cards.name: True Grit
text: <kw>Exhaust</kw> a random card from your hand.

cards.name: Warcry
text: Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Warcry+
text: Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Wild Strike
text: Shuffle a <kw>Wound</kw> into your draw pile.

cards.name: Wild Strike+
text: Shuffle a <kw>Wound</kw> into your draw pile.

cards.name: Battle Trance
text: You cannot draw additional cards this turn.

cards.name: Battle Trance+
text: You cannot draw additional cards this turn.

cards.name: Blood for Blood
text: Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose HP in combat.

cards.name: Blood for Blood+
text: Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose <kw>HP</kw> in combat.

cards.name: Combust
text: At the end of your turn, lose 1 <kw>HP</kw> and deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Combust+

cards.name: Corruption
text: Whenever you play a Skill, <kw>Exhaust</kw> it.

cards.name: Corruption+
text: Whenever you play a Skill, <kw>Exhaust</kw> it.

cards.name: Dropkick
text: If the target is <kw>Vulnerable</kw>, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Dropkick+
text: If the target is <kw>Vulnerable</kw>, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Dual Wield
text: Create a copy of a card in your hand.

cards.name: Dual Wield+
text: Create <u>2</u> copies of a card in your hand.

cards.name: Evolve
text: Whenever you draw a <kw>Wound</kw>, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Evolve+

cards.name: Fire Breathing
text: At the end of your turn, for each Attack played this turn deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Fire Breathing+
text: At the end of your turn, for each Attack played this turn deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Flame Barrier
text: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 damage to the attacker.

text: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 damage to the attacker.

text: Add a random Attack to your hand.

cards.name: Infernal Blade+
text: Add a random Attack to your hand.

cards.name: Metallicize+

cards.name: Rage+
text: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain <u>6</u> <kw>Block</kw>.

cards.name: Rampage

cards.name: Rampage+
text: Every time this card is played, increase its damage by <u>8</u> for this combat.

cards.name: Rupture

cards.name: Rupture+
text: Whenever you lose <kw>HP</kw> from a card, gain 1 <kw>Strength</kw>.

cards.name: Searing Blow+1
text: Can be <kw>Upgraded</kw> any number of times.

text: <kw>Exhaust</kw> all non‑Attack cards in your hand and gain 5 <kw>Block</kw> for each.

cards.name: Sever Soul
text: <kw>Exhaust</kw> all non‑Attack cards in your hand.

cards.name: Sever Soul+
text: <kw>Exhaust</kw> all non‑Attack cards in your hand.

cards.name: Barricade

cards.name: Barricade+
text: <kw>Block</kw> no longer expires at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Berserk

cards.name: Berserk+
text: If your <kw>HP</kw> is below 50%, gain 1 energy at the start of each turn.

text: At the start of your turn, lose 1 <kw>HP</kw> and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Brutality+

cards.name: Dark Embrace

cards.name: Dark Embrace+
text: Whenever a card is <kw>Exhausted</kw>, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Double Tap+

cards.name: Exhume

cards.name: Exhume+

cards.name: Feed

cards.name: Feed+

cards.name: Juggernaut+

cards.name: After Image

cards.name: Blur

cards.name: Blur+

cards.name: Bullet Time

cards.name: Choke

text: Cost 1 less Energy for each discarded card this turn.
